domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: 60 Minutes
entity.description: The oldest and most-watched newsmagazine on television gets the real story on America's most prevalent issues. CBS News correspondents contribute segments to each hourlong episode. Topics range from hard news coverage to politics, lifestyle, pop culture, business, health, and science. The correspondents and contributors include Lesley Stahl, Scott Pelley, Anderson Cooper, Bill Whitaker, Sharyn Alfonsi, Jon Wertheim and Norah O'Donnell .

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @60Minutes If you’re looking for right wing trolls & bots to block, no better list than the freaks in the replies here howling that debunking this administration’s pathetic attempts to pass blame for its failures on COVID-19 to China constitutes “treason”.
